title: 2014: Songs of the Year 100 – 81
body:
### [Spotify Playlist](http://open.

spotify.com/user/joshmdalton/playlist/3J8OVIMwFKCazvt7JmVoJK) [100 - 81](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/30472-2014-songs-year-100-81) // [80 - 61](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/30479-2014-songs-2014-80-61) // [60 - 41](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/30488-2014-songs-of-the-year-60-41) // [40 - 21](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/30495-2014-songs-of-the-year-40-21) // [20 - 1](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/30513-2014-songs-of-the-year-20-1) 100\. **Honne** – _Warm on a Cold Night_ 99\. **Sea Oleena** – _If I’m_ 98\. **Broods** – _Mother & Father_ 97\. **Big K.R.I.T.** – Soul Food 96\. **Mr. Twin Sister** – _Blush_ 95\. **Hozier** – _From Eden_ 94\. **Lorde** – _Yellow Flicker Beat_ 93\. **Mick Jenkins**  – _Jazz_ 92\. **Grouper** – _Holding_ 91\. **Marissa Nadler** – _Firecrackers_ 90\. **Slow Magic** – _Girls_ 89. **Formation** – _Young Ones_ 88\. **The Horrors** – _So Now You Know_ 87\. **Travis Scott** – _Mamacita_ 86\. **Lana Del Rey** – _Ultraviolence_ 85\. **Ibeyi** – _Oya_ 84\. **SALES** – _Renee_ 83\. **AKW** – _The Hunt_ 82\. **Talos** – _Tethered Bones_ 81\. **Adult Jazz** – _Springful_ ### [Spotify Playlist](http://open.spotify.com/user/joshmdalton/playlist/3J8OVIMwFKCazvt7JmVoJK) [100 - 81](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/30472-2014-songs-year-100-81) // [80 - 61](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/30479-2014-songs-2014-80-61) // [60 - 41](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/30488-2014-songs-of-the-year-60-41) // [40 - 21](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/30495-2014-songs-of-the-year-40-21) // [20 - 1](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/30513-2014-songs-of-the-year-20-1)
